column5: Private efficiency close to the shops and restaurants in Bishop Arts and 10 min from downtown Dallas & 16 miles to Arlington (Cowboys Stadium). Accommodates two guests located in a historic conservation district. It's complete with a full bed, full bathroom & kitchenette. Dogs under 40lbs are welcome to stay (with pet fee. See house rules) . An Air mattress can be provided upon request. Cable is through Sling TV. Also has netflix setup. Many more apps available with the smart tv.
